title: English Listening Proficiency Diagnosis and Improvement Program Using Computer-Based Dynamic Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar knowledge, ability to comprehend simple English sentences
context.additional_context: Personalized listening assessment and learning support program conducted via iSpring Quiz Maker on individual learning devices

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose type-specific weaknesses (overview, details, inference questions) in English listening assessments with 80% accuracy
Learners can establish three or more learning goals and strategies based on dynamic assessment feedback
Learners can achieve a Listening Proficiency Score (LPS) improvement of 15% or more compared to pre-program assessments upon completion

resources: Personal BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Devices

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
